properties.description: This is a data flow example of how to load facts into your fact table from a single sample Employee dimension. There is also an example of handling early-arriving facts.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/Facts/today/*.csv']) ~> Facts
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployee
Facts derive(employeeID = toInteger(id),
		iscurrent = 1,
		facttimestamp = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttributes
SetAttributes, DimEmployee lookup(employeeID == DimEmployee@id
	&& iscurrent == 1,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDimEmployee
CheckForEarlyFact aggregate(TotalHours = sum(toInteger(Hours)),
		TotalAmount = sum(toInteger(Amount))) ~> DailyAggs
LookupDimEmployee select(mapColumn(
		employeeID,
		Hours,
		Amount,
		ProjDate,
		facttimestamp,
		EmpID,
		surrogatekey,
		Region,
		Status,
		EmpFunction,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent = DimEmployee@iscurrent,
		processtime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> OrigData
DailyAggs, OrigData join(DailyAggs@ProjDate == OrigData@ProjDate
	&& DailyAggs@employeeID == OrigData@employeeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAllColumns
LookupDimEmployee derive(employeeID = iif(isNull(employeeID),0,employeeID)) ~> CheckForEarlyFact
JoinAllColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	mapColumn(
		ProjDate = OrigData@ProjDate,
		employeeID = OrigData@employeeID,
		TotalHours,
		TotalAmount,
		facttimestamp,
		surrogatekey,
		Region,
		Status,
		EmpFunction,
		Level,
		Role,
		processtime
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4),
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> writeFactTable
